sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些词或词组均含有"最后，终于"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: at last, at length, eventually, finally, in the end, lastly
means: at last ：多指经主观努力，克服各种困难后才终于达到目的。
at length ：强调经历一段长时间后终于完成，侧重在时间部分。
eventually ：侧重于动作或行为的结果。
finally ：常与at last换用，都可用于对往事的描述，但finally不带感情色彩，指一系列事情的最后结局。
in the end与at last同义，但in the end不仅可指"过去"还可表示对"未来"的预计。
lastly ：指连续顺序的最后，通常用在列举事情的场合。

sentence.Network_en: Eventually, you'll learn to cry that on the inside.
sentence.Network_cn: 终有一天，你会学会让泪往心里流。

sentence.Network_en: Mobutu ascended through the ranks, eventually becoming commander of the army.
sentence.Network_cn: 蒙博托出身行伍，通过一级级晋升，最终成为了陆军司令。

sentence.Network_en: Eventually they reached a pair of ornately carved doors.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们最终来到一扇雕刻精美的对开门前。

list.abs: 2011-10-13 谁有stephen king的《世事无常》（everything's eventual）英文... 2010-10-16 一道英语题：你感慨世事无常，人总会变的。
最终一致性（eventual consistency）：当没有新更新的情况下，更新最终会通过网络传播到所有副本点，所有副本点最终会一致，也 …
eventual goal ; manager of marketing department .最终目标：销售部门的经理。
it is rumored that they eventually broke up ., 谣传他们最终分手了.

entry.def: Eventually means in the end, especially after a lot of delays, problems, or arguments.

example.ex: Eventually, the army caught up with him in Latvia...
example.tran: 最终，大部队在拉脱维亚赶上了他。

example.ex: The flight eventually got away six hours late.
example.tran: 那个航班推迟了6个小时后终于起飞。

entry.def: Eventually means at the end of a situation or process or as the final result of it.

example.ex: Eventually your child will leave home to lead her own life as a fully independent adult...
example.tran: 最后，你的孩子会离开家，作为一个完全独立的成年人过她自己的生活。

example.ex: She sees the bar as a starting point and eventually plans to run her own chain of country inns.
example.tran: 她把那间酒吧当作一个起点，最终计划是经营自己的乡村旅馆连锁店。

means.word_mean: 1. within an indefinite time or at an unspecified future time;

sentences.sentence: "he longed for the flowers that were yet to show themselves"
"sooner or later you will have to face the facts"
"in time they came to accept the harsh reality"

means.word_mean: 2. after a long period of time or an especially long delay;

auth_sentence.content: Eventually the female has to concede to her mate.
auth_sentence.res_content: Eventually the female has to concede to her mate.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Eventually the female has to concede to her mate.

auth_sentence.content: Eventually Michael recovered, though his dad didn't.
auth_sentence.res_content: Eventually Michael recovered, though his dad didn't.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Eventually Michael recovered, though his dad didn't.

auth_sentence.content: However, he was eventually expelled for revolutionary activity.
auth_sentence.res_content: However, he was eventually expelled for revolutionary activity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: However, he was eventually expelled for revolutionary activity.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 重大的,重要的,多变故的
stems_affixes.word_buile: event[n.事件,事情]+ful充满……的→事件多→多变故的
event[n.事件,事情]+ual……的→出事之后[最终]的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 善于发明或创造的,有发明或创造才能的
stems_affixes.word_buile: invent[v.发明,创造;捏造,虚构]+ive……的→adj.善于发明或创造的,有发明或创造才能的
prevent[v.[from]预防,防止,阻止,制止,妨碍]+ive……的→adj.预防性的
eventual[adj.最后的,结局的,最终的]+ly表副词→adv.最后, 终于
eventual最终的+ity表名词→最终可能发生的
inter之间+vent走+ion表名词→走在二者之间→干涉
invent发明,创造+ion表名词→n.发明, 创造
convention集会;习俗+ality表名词→n.陈规陋习,因袭传统
vent风→v.发泄[情绪],开孔 n.孔,口
ventilate[v.使通风;给…装通风设备]+ion表名词→n.通风
vent风→v.发泄[情绪],开孔 n.孔,口
vent风+ilate=ate表动词→v.使通风;给…装通风设备

Sentence.sentence: Anyway, the pain will eventually end.
Eventually she wants to quit teaching and work as a full-time journalist.
What will the current economic crisis eventually do to some married couples

If the collapse of the rain forests speeds up dramatically,it could eventually release 3.5-5 billion metric tons of carbon into the atmosphere each year - making forests the leading source of greenhouse gases.
Scientists will eventually find cures for Ebola.
They would eventually kill off the deer.

sentences.en: He hated his stepfather and eventually ran away from home.
sentences.cn: 他恨他的继父, 最终从家中逃走了。
”“你什么时候回来?”“最后总会回来的。”

jushi.english: Their reasoning was correct, and it was eventually justified by events.
jushi.chinese: 他们的推理正确,事实终于证明那种判断是正确的。

jushi.english: He wouldn't agree, no matter how hard we argued, but eventually he saw the light and changed his mind.
jushi.chinese: 不管我们怎样讲,他总是不同意,但后来终于领悟了,并改变了主意。

jushi.english: He enjoyed matching his wits against hers, allowing her to think that she was fooling him, and turning the tables on him eventually.
jushi.chinese: 他喜欢和她斗智,先让她觉得她在愚弄他,最后使情况对他有利。
